# curlpipebash.com

> Documentation and analysis of "curl | bash" installation scripts

This site catalogs popular curl|bash installers (Docker, Homebrew, Laravel, nvm, etc.) with:
- Security analysis and best practices
- Code statistics (lines, comments, complexity)
- Detailed breakdowns of what each script modifies

## Sections
- /about/ - About the project
- /best-practices/ - Security guidelines for curl|bash
- /blog/ - Analysis posts for specific scripts (Docker, Homebrew, Basher, PHP, OpenClaw)

## Key Topics
- curl|bash security risks and mitigations
- Script analysis methodology
- Package manager installation scripts
- Container runtime installers
